column5: Just looked at the webcam in Sioux Lookout WOW!! How much ice is left? Could we have ice out the first week of April? What is the record?http://www.sweetwatercruises.com/

http://www.tomahawkresort.ca/ReginaBayCamera.cfmThis webcam still shows some ice, they are also working on a new cabin! It looks like temps are going to be cooler, so we will see how this years ice lasts.

I was down at the shore working on some docks, taking advantage of the low water, and I was in waders and I could walk out about 8 feet and there was 3 inches of not safe ice, really honeycombed, I was out there breaking it away from the dock with a 2x6, I think there is still close to 8-10 inches at most and really honeycombed with lots of pressure holes
